venue.name: Irish Cultural Centre of New England

item.description:
Come along and support the new look Demons when they take on the Baltimore/Washington Eagles in the first BIG interstate game of the season.

This should be a tough, high skilled encounter which will be great to watch.

We are VERY privileged to have the opportunity to play at the beautiful surrounds of the Irish Cultural Centre in Canton. The facilities here include a fully stocked bar and restaurant so come down with your friends, family and pets for a few drinks, some food and a fun day out in the sun.

To get there its easiest in a car. Its about 25 mins down 93 south then 138, let me know if you would like to attend but need a ride and i will do my best to set something up. Also let me know if you will be driving and have room for others too.

Alternatively catch the train from south station to canton junction and its a short cab ride from there.

Post match function with a rocking live band later on in the night will be held at Tommy Doyles HARVARD SQUARE at 8pm with shenanigans sure to continue well into the night. Come join!

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Demons V Baltimore/Washington Eagles Footy Match and Post Match Party
